trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias desta classe são transmitidas para um <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>método que é chamado quando um <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>chamada seja concluída.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>métodos enviar um pedido de eco Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) no modo assíncrono e aguarde que uma mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP correspondente.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>propriedade contém o resultado do pedido de eco ICMP.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que contenha dados que descreve uma tentativa para enviar uma mensagem de pedido de eco Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) e receber uma mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP correspondente.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>não é <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, não deve utilizar os valores que são devolvidos pelo <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Propriedades irão devolver zero e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>irá devolver a propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"></xref> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"> </xref> objeto que descreve os resultados do pedido de eco ICMP.
